org.lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Interface AbstractPopCanAcceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeliveryChuteSimulator, PopCanChannelSimulator

    public interface AbstractPopCanAcceptor
    A simple interface to allow a device to communicate with another device that accepts pop cans.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptPop(PopCan pop)
      Instructs the device to take the pop can as input.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptPop

        void acceptPop(PopCan pop)
               throws CapacityExceededException,
                      DisabledException
        Instructs the device to take the pop can as input.
        Parameters:
        pop - The pop can to be taken as input.
        Throws:
        CapacityExceededException - if the device does not have enough space for the pop can.
        DisabledException - if the device is currently disabled.
